languages.text: Но велика была жажда крови у тени, что звалась Палачом. Яростно рыкнув, набросилось чудовище на Домин, окружило лезвиями, и лишь чары Вени'Заккари отогнали монстра прочь. Ибо страшен тот, кто сошел со своей тропы. Он — есть Смерть.

But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.
languages.original_text: Но велика была жажда крови у тени, что звалась Палачом. Яростно рыкнув, набросилось чудовище на Домин, окружило лезвиями, и лишь чары Вени'Заккари отогнали монстра прочь. Ибо страшен тот, кто сошел со своей тропы. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Enim, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; only Oa'Weisz's sorcery drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their path is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Enim, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; only Oa'Weisz's sorcery drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their path is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Enim, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Oa'Weisz that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their path is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Enim, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Oa'Weisz that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their path is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.

But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.

languages.text: Doch der Schatten, der als der Henker bekannt war, war von einer großen Blutlust erfüllt. Das Monster brüllte wild und stürmte auf {mf|den|die} Domin zu, umzingelte {mf|ihn|sie} mit Klingen. Nur die Magie von Veni'Zacchary vertrieb das Monster. Denn wer von seinem Pfad abgekommen ist, der ist zu fürchten. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Doch der Schatten, der als der Henker bekannt war, war von einer großen Blutlust erfüllt. Das Monster brüllte wild und stürmte auf {mf|den|die} Domin zu, umzingelte {mf|ihn|sie} mit Klingen. Nur die Magie von Veni'Zacchary vertrieb das Monster. Denn wer von seinem Pfad abgekommen ist, der ist zu fürchten. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: Pero la sombra conocida como el Verdugo estaba llena de sed de sangre. El monstruo rugió ferozmente y cargó contra {mf|el|la} Domin, rodeándol{mf|o|a} de cuchillas. Solo la magia de Veni'Zacchary pudo rechazar al monstruo. Pues temible es quien se desvía de su hilo. Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text: But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Pero la sombra conocida como el Verdugo estaba llena de sed de sangre. El monstruo rugió ferozmente y cargó contra {mf|el|la} Domin, rodeándol{mf|o|a} de cuchillas. Solo la magia de Veni'Zacchary pudo rechazar al monstruo. Pues temible es quien se desvía de su hilo. Él es la muerte.

languages.text: だが、処刑人としても知られる影は、血への大きな渇望を抱えていた。その怪物は獰猛に咆哮してドミンに襲い掛かり、刃でもって取り囲んだ。怪物を追い払えたのはヴェニ・ザカリーの魔術のみだった。道を踏み外した者は恐れられる。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: だが、処刑人としても知られる影は、血への大きな渇望を抱えていた。その怪物は獰猛に咆哮してドミンに襲い掛かり、刃でもって取り囲んだ。怪物を追い払えたのはヴェニ・ザカリーの魔術のみだった。道を踏み外した者は恐れられる。彼は死だ。

languages.text: 然而，行刑者的影子充满了对鲜血的渴望。怪物怒吼着，朝秘者冲了过去，浑身上下的利刃将{mf|他|她}包裹其中。这个时候，帷者扎卡里施展了巫术的力量，将怪物击退了。偏离正途之人将会成为可畏的敌人。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 然而，行刑者的影子充满了对鲜血的渴望。怪物怒吼着，朝秘者冲了过去，浑身上下的利刃将{mf|他|她}包裹其中。这个时候，帷者扎卡里施展了巫术的力量，将怪物击退了。偏离正途之人将会成为可畏的敌人。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: Mais une ombre appelée l'Exécuteur était animée d'une grande soif de sang. Le monstre poussa un rugissement féroce avant de charger {mf|le|la} Domin et de {mf|le|la} submerger de lames. Ce n'est que grâce à la sorcellerie de Veni'Zacchary que la bête put être repoussée. Car il faut craindre celui qui s'écarte de son fil. Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text: But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Mais une ombre appelée l'Exécuteur était animée d'une grande soif de sang. Le monstre poussa un rugissement féroce avant de charger {mf|le|la} Domin et de {mf|le|la} submerger de lames. Ce n'est que grâce à la sorcellerie de Veni'Zacchary que la bête put être repoussée. Car il faut craindre celui qui s'écarte de son fil. Il incarne la mort.

languages.text: Fakat Cellat olarak bilinen gölgenin kana karşı muazzam bir düşkünlüğü vardı. Canavar, öfkeyle kükredi ve hücum ettiği Domin'in etrafını kılıçlarıyla sardı. Canavarı uzaklaştıran, yalnızca Veni'Zacchary'nin sahirliği oldu. Zira ipliğinin yolundan sapanlardan korkmak gerekir. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: But the shadow known as the Executioner was filled with a great lust for blood. The monster roared fiercely and charged at the Domin, surrounding {mf|him|her} with blades; it was only the sorcery of Veni'Zacchary that drove the monster away. For one who has strayed from their thread is to be feared. He is Death.
